title: New: Sam Thomas – Blue Cologne
content:
Sam Thomas, the English multi-instrumentalist, has released another cut from his second single, ‘Gifts’, the haunting and ethereal ‘Blue Cologne’.

While ‘Gift’ has a strong post-rock vibe, ‘Blue Cologne’ has the artist exhibiting his Classical chops.

The track is intricately put together, with the instruments washing and weaving over one another. There’s a tension bubbling underneath ‘Blue Cologne’, giving it enough edge to avoid slipping into tedium, while remaining a pleasant listen.

You can give the track a spin below, maybe even grab a pair of headphones and chill in the sun. Sam Thomas’ debut album, Blind Theatre, is coming out soon on Just Music and you’ll be able grab it at the usual places. Peace.
